scripts.postinstall: typings install && mkdir -p dist && npm run build-vendor
scripts.build-vendor: npm run build-vendor-js && npm run build-vendor-css
scripts.features: ./echolor.sh --hex 1abc9c 'Running behaviour tests...' && ts-node node_modules/.bin/cucumber.js --tags ~@ignore --format progress tests/features
scripts.build-js-min: ./echolor.sh --hex 1abc9c 'Building gefri.min.js...' && browserify src/gefri.ns.ts -p [tsify] --standalone gefri | uglifyjs -c warnings=false > dist/gefri.min.js
scripts.build-js: ./echolor.sh --hex 1abc9c 'Building gefri.js...' && browserify src/gefri.ns.ts -p [tsify] -v --debug -o --standalone gefri > dist/gefri.js && cat dist/gefri.js > demo/gefri.js
scripts.watch: npm run watch-ts & npm run watch-specs & npm run watch-features
scripts.on-ts-change: npm run coverage && npm run build-js && npm run build-js-min && npm run features && npm run done
scripts.on-specs-change: npm run coverage && npm run done
scripts.on-features-change: npm run build-js && npm run features && npm run done
scripts.serve-watch: npm run serve & npm run watch
